programme.title: 1996 Russian presidential elections
programme.short_synopsis: Boris Yeltsin wins the 1996 Russian presidential election.
programme.medium_synopsis: Boris Yeltsin's victory in the Russian presidential elections, the relative novelty of universal suffrage in the West and the need for democracy, as discussed by Alistair Cooke.
